column5: Just wanted to share a picture of my 2.5 yr old son's 1st Fish.  Pumpkinseed caught on Worm & hook from Black Lake (Sharbot Lake PP)  Proud moment!  He's hooked!
right on, greatfor kids to get into enjoying and learning about the outdoors..I always love the family reports
That is one extremely proud fisherman....WTG kiddo  Thanks for sharing Leechman

Awesome!  I am 18 and remember my first fish like it was yesterday, I was younger than the little guy and strapped into a carseat off the side of the road at cranberry marsh in Whitby. It was a catfish.  Those who know the area know that you cannot park there anymore because somone got killed at the side of the road, its WAY more busy now...
Very nice! He looks very happy about it also! I have a feeling this is the start of quite a few fishing adventures together. thanks for sharing.
He's got that "YEAH MAN!" look, very cool...
Love these posts!!!  Congrats to your little guy on his first....the smile and wonderment of it all is priceless.  He's shaping up to be a lifelong fishing partner for you.
What a great smile on the little guy!
